long_description: The all-purpose, cold-weather Nuptse mittens from The North Face feature 600-fill-power down insulation to keep hands warm during winter camping trips and alpine explorations. Water-resistant ripstop nylon exteriors and leather palms shed moisture and breathe well; brushed tricot lining feels soft against skin. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive in liners dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry moves moisture from 1 layer to another to keep you dry. Soft fabric on back of thumbs is great for wiping nose drips. Full-length, over-the-cuff gauntlets feature shockcords with cordlocks to seal out cold air. Nuptse mittens feature reinforced leather palms and tips for exceptional durability.
short_description: The all-purpose, cold-weather Nuptse mittens from The North Face feature 600-fill-power down insulation to keep hands warm during winter camping trips and alpine explorations.
